title: Emerging
creator_credit: Amaranth Productions and Michael Mc Farland
brief_description: Endeavours to create a spectrum of moods and feelings by showing the continuing evolution of public awareness in attitudes towards disabled people, the progress which is being made in rehabilitation technology and architectural design and the many achievements disabled people are capable of.
